Title: Down with Soviet revisionism! Smash Brezhnev's dog's head to pulp! Smash Kosygin's dog's head to pulp!
Designer: Revolutionary Rebel Command of the Shanghai Publishing System (上海出版系统革命司令部)Art Front Liaison Station of the Shanghai Workers Revolutionary Rebel Headquarters (上海工人革命造反总司令部美术战线联络站)"Fight to the Bitter End" Corps of Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House (上海人民美术出版社《拼到底》兵)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: In 1967 Leonid Brezhnev (Брежнев) was General Secretary of the Communist Party, Alexei Kosygin (Косыгин) Premier of the Soviet Union.
